file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 21-51-07-04 - PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. The pack setdown switch is installed on the compressor outlet duct of each cooling pack. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 21-51-07-000-801-A PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - REMOVAL PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - INSTALLA- ALL 21-51-07-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 21-51-07 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-51-07-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the pack setdown switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 191 191EL Left side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing 191 191FR Right side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To loosen the switch available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH or RH cooling pack I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the access panel (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), as applicable: – 191EL (Pack setdown switch of the LH cooling pack). – 191FR (Pack setdown switch of the RH cooling pack). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-51-07 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (2) Cut the lockwire (3). (3) Remove the switch (2). (4) Discard the O-ring (4). (5) Use a cap to cover the opening in the duct to prevent the entry of unwanted material. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-51-07 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Pack Setdown Switch - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 191 B DET. A (LEFT SIDE) 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. LOCKWIRE 4. O-RING 1 2. PACK SETDOWN SWITCH DET. B 1 T= 6.78 Nm (60 lb.in) to 7.90 Nm (70 lb.in) 145AMM210041.MCE F EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 21-51-07 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 21-51-07-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PACK SETDOWN SWITCH - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the pack setdown switch. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - IPC 21-51-00 COOLING PACK SYSTEM C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 191 191EL Left side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing 191 191FR Right side of the wing-to-fuselage fairing D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To tighten the switch available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MS20995C20 Lockwire AR G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) O-ring IPC 21-51-00 1/LRU H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task RH or LH cooling pack EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-51-07 Page 5 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE SWITCH THAT YOU WILL INSTALL HAS THE CORRECT PART NUMBER FOR THAT LOCATION (REFER TO IPC 21-51-00). IF YOU DO NOT OBEY THIS PRECAUTION, DAMAGE TO THE RELATED DUCT CAN OCCUR AND THERE CAN BE HOT AIR LEAKAGE. (1) Remove the cap from the duct opening. (2) Make sure that the duct is clean. (3) Put the switch (2) together with the new O-ring (4) in the installation position. (4) Install the switch (2). (5) Tighten and safety the switch nut. (6) Connect the electrical connector (1). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the access panel (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100), as applicable: – 191EL (Pack setdown switch of the LH cooling pack). – 191FR (Pack setdown switch of the RH cooling pack). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 21-51-07 Page 6 of 6 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
